radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent atelectasis in lung bases, enlarged cardiac silhouette with dilatation of left atrium, 4-mm hypoattenuating lesion in right hepatic lobe, multiple kidney cysts including a 3.3 x 3.2 cm cyst in the left kidney, well-defined hypoattenuated focus in the right kidney, marked eccentric wall thickening of the sigmoid colon with inflammatory changes in adjacent mesenteric fat, 15 x 20 mm intramural lesion in sigmoid colon, mild diverticulosis, and no free fluid or pathologically enlarged lymph nodes.
